readme.name: README.md
readme.content: Displays detailed product information: product image, product name, product SKU, a drop-down menu with product variants, list of bundles, price, packaging unit information, quantity input "delete" link, and a comment box.

definitions.name: data
definitions.contract:
cart: required,
    isQuoteEditable: required,
    cartItem: required,
    attributes: required
